```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(sf)
library(jsonlite)

#load geojson from url
data <- 
  st_read('https://opendata.arcgis.com/datasets/01fd6b2d7600446d8af768005992f76a_3.geojson') %>%
  jsonlite::parse_json(simplifyVector = FALSE)

```

##### Interactive View
```{r}
mapview::mapview(data)
```

##### Explore
```{r}

data %>%
  ggplot() +
  geom_sf() +
  coord_sf() +
  ggthemes::theme_map()

```
